roleset.name: change, modify
roleset.note: MODULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'modulate' based on sentences in wsj. No verbnet entry. (from modulate.01-v predicate notes)
MODULATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Cryosphere.

example.name: modulate-v: unaccusative
example.text: The chords modulate, but there is little filigree even though his fingers begin to wander over more of the keys.

example.name: modulation-n: all args
example.text: John modulated the chord progression from C major to C-sharp major, the long way around.

example.name: modulation-n
example.text: Modulation of HS was caused mainly by an increase of temperature , which is clearly apparent in Fig .
